Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Athletic \Ath`let"ic\, a. [L. athleticus, Gr. ?. See {Athlete}.] 1. Of or pertaining to athletes or to the exercises practiced by them; as, athletic games or sports. [1913 Webster]
2. Befitting an athlete; strong; muscular; robust; vigorous; as, athletic Celts. ``Athletic soundness.'' --South. -- {Ath*let"ic*al*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]

athletic adj 1: relating to or befitting athletics or athletes; "athletic facilities" 2: vigorously active; "an acrobatic dance"; "an athletic child"; "athletic playing"; "gymnastic exercises" [syn: {acrobatic}, {gymnastic}] 3: having a sturdy and well proportioned body; "an athletic build"
